mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, a.* from (select * from inquiry where member_idx=#{member_idx} order by inquiry_idx desc) a) where rnum >= #{start} and rnum <= #{end}
select count(*) from inquiry where member_idx=#{member_idx}
mapper.update: update member set member_block=#{value} where member_idx= (select member_idx from inquiry where inquiry_idx=#{inquiry_idx})
